description: Designed to be worn over the VentureLayer 200 LS or Henley, this packable, lightweight hooded fleece provides needed warmth as temperatures drop. The lightweight, stretch, woven exterior has a C0 DWR finish for water resistance and classic fleece under the hood for light warmth. This durable fleece has 4-way stretch that keeps you comfortable while you move. As with every VentureLayer piece, this style is engineered to pack into its own pocket for easy storage.
name: Royal Robbins Venturelayer Fleece Full-Zip Hoodie - Mens
